definition: High-level techniques combining skill and art, usually requiring advanced Internal Energy (Qi).

telekinesis_and_manipulation.name: 허공섭물 (Void Grabbing / 虛空攝物)
telekinesis_and_manipulation.mechanic: Moving objects without physical contact using invisible Qi.

telekinesis_and_manipulation.name: 어검술 (Sword Control / 馭劍術)
telekinesis_and_manipulation.mechanic: Telekinetic manipulation of a sword for combat.
telekinesis_and_manipulation.comparison: Advanced version of Void Grabbing. Can handle heavy weapons and complex maneuvers.

physics_and_impact.name: 격산타우 (Mountain Hitting Ox / 隔山打牛)
physics_and_impact.mechanic: Delivering shockwaves through an obstacle to hit the target behind/inside.
physics_and_impact.advantage: Ignores armor/defense. Destroys internal organs while leaving the surface intact.

physics_and_impact.name: 사량발천근 (Four Ounces Move 1000 Pounds / 四兩撥千斤)
physics_and_impact.mechanic: Using minimal force to deflect massive power.
physics_and_impact.concept: Softness overcomes Hardness (Yu-Neung-Je-Gang / 柔能制剛).

physics_and_impact.name: 천근추 (Thousand Pound Drop / 千斤錘)
physics_and_impact.mechanic: Instantly increasing body weight using Qi.
physics_and_impact.variation: Can be reversed to lighten body for water walking.

energy_interaction.name: 삼매진화 (Samadhi True Fire / 三昧眞火)
energy_interaction.mechanic: Generating intense heat or flame using Internal Energy.

energy_interaction.name: 차기미기 (Borrowing Qi / 借氣彌氣)
energy_interaction.mechanic: Absorbing opponent's Qi into one's own.
energy_interaction.meta_note: Old-school trope. Often considered 'Dark Arts' or balance-breaking. Similar to 'Star Sucking Great Art (흡성대법)'.

body_and_growth.name: 환골탈태 (Rebirth / 換骨奪胎)
body_and_growth.effect: Physical reconstruction for optimal martial arts. Rejuvenation (Ban-ro-hwan-dong).

body_and_growth.name: 벌모세수 (Marrow Cleansing / 伐毛洗髓)
body_and_growth.mechanic: A master uses Qi to cleanse a disciple's meridians/impurities.
body_and_growth.target: Beginners or those too old to start training.

interaction_with_others.name: 격체전공 (Energy Transmission / 隔體傳功)
interaction_with_others.mechanic: Transferring one's lifetime cultivation to another via physical contact.
interaction_with_others.narrative_use: Dying master passing legacy to protagonist.

interaction_with_others.name: 추궁과혈 (Pushing Palace Crossing Acupoints / 推宮過穴)
interaction_with_others.mechanic: Massaging acupoints with Qi to heal internal injuries.
interaction_with_others.risk: High energy consumption. Requires absolute trust (defenseless state).
interaction_with_others.trope: Romantic tension builder (Male hero healing injured female).

interaction_with_others.name: 분근착골 (Bone Splitting / 分筋錯骨)
interaction_with_others.mechanic: Dislocating joints and twisting muscles via acupoint manipulation.
